tool.name: Count uniquely mapped reads
tool.description: for each chromosome or contig in a SAM file
tool.help:
This tool runs the FLS SamStats program to count how many reads are uniquely mapped onto each chromosome or contig in a SAM file. The program counts any reads which have been assigned a genomic coordinate.
Amongst other things this can provide an early warning when there is a problem mapping to a genome where manipulations have taken place.
